class.name: ConcavePolygonShape
class.description: Concave polygon shape resource, which can be set into a [PhysicsBody] or area. This shape is created by feeding a list of triangles. [b]Note:[/b] When used for collision, [ConcavePolygonShape] is intended to work with static [PhysicsBody] nodes like [StaticBody] and will not work with [KinematicBody] or [RigidBody] with a mode other than Static.

method.name: get_faces
method.description: Returns the faces (an array of triangles).

method.name: set_faces
method.description: Sets the faces (an array of triangles).
